thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 4 of 259
thread.title: Kara

author: Kara
title: Kara
text:
I love HelloFresh and I am a weekly subscriber and will continue to be. The food is delicious, delivery is almost always right on schedule (and I say almost here only because it was delayed ONCE because of a blizzard so... understandable). HelloFresh has really helped me expand my palette and it's a lot of fun to cook with my husband after work and enjoy a unique, new meal with him in the evenings.
My only issues with HelloFresh is I can not go into my account and confirm that a discount has been applied until it's actually charged to my credit card. It's also a little frustrating that Freebies expire, but without telling you their expiration date...
